title: Minuteman Missile National Historic Site: Pets
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Pets              Pets         Dogs must be on a leash or otherwise confined while in the park Heidi Weimer Photo  Regulations Concerning Pets Pets are members of our families, but there are some things you should be aware of before bringing pets to the park. To provide for the safety and enjoyment of pets, owners and fellow visitors, we request that pet owner comply with the following rules when visiting Minuteman Missile with their animals.  Pets in South Dakota must be on a leash at all times. In South Dakota, pets must be on a leash no longer than 10 feet. Pet owners may not tie their animals to fences or other park structures. Only service animals or those in training to become service animals are allowed inside buildings with their owners or trainers. Owners are responsible for removing any pet excrement left by their animals in the park's exhibit areas and other areas with heavy public use. Please do not leave pets unattended.
